title: AKIOS Workflow Schema
description: JSON schema for AKIOS workflow validation (v1.2 â€” adds parallel blocks, webhook/database agents, plugin support)

agent.description: Core agents: filesystem, http, llm, tool_executor, webhook, database. Plugin agents also accepted.

condition.description: Optional expression evaluated against prior step outputs. Step is skipped when the expression evaluates to false.

on_error.description: Error recovery strategy: skip (continue workflow), fail (halt), retry (re-attempt with backoff).
